abstract: Yahoo reported a net loss of $303 million for the quarter on a number of one-time charges and sales were slightly down as more marketers pulled back on spending.
snippet: Yahoo reported a net loss of $303 million for the quarter on a number of one-time charges and sales were slightly down as more marketers pulled back on spending.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Will Carol A. Bartz sell Yahoo’s search business to Microsoft?

headline.main: Yang’s Era at Yahoo Ends With a Loss
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Chief Discourages Talk of Deals

abstract: The foundation behind Firefox hopes $100,000 will build a free online video format to rival software from Microsoft and Adobe.
snippet: The foundation behind Firefox hopes $100,000 will build a free online video format to rival software from Microsoft and Adobe.
lead_paragraph: The Mozilla Foundation is trying to open one of the last proprietary parts of the Web: Video standards. The group behind the Firefox browser announced that it is giving a $100,000 grant, by way of the Wikimedia Foundation, to help develop an open-source standard for Internet video.

headline.main: Mozilla Spends Money to Make Web Video Free
